q: , Peter Rice confirmed there would be four judges on the show, two men and two women, but insisted Simon Cowell would not be making the final decision on who would appear on it. He said: There's great speculation. I think Simon Cowell is still meeting and trying to find the right mixture. It'll be four judges as it is in England- it's two men, two women, one of which will be Simon Cowell .'`` Simon Cowell 's going to come to us and he's going to say,` This is who I would like the judges to be,' and we'll have a conversation about it. Peter Rice also claimed the show would be different from` American Idol' because of the involvement of judges with their acts, meaning they could find the next`` Stevie Wonder or Michael Jackson ''. It's totally your behavior, whether you have a good dog that minds well and is not a problem to society or you turn it into a vicious animal that will bite the mailman, the girl next door or grandma walking down the street, Michael Hansen said.
